resource.name: HPI Endpoint
resource.description: Endpoints used by the HPI.

resource.name: HPI Location
resource.description: Locations used by the HPI. These are also called Facilities.

resource.name: HPI Organization
resource.description: Organizations used by the HPI. For example DHB's, PHO's and Primary care Practices

resource.name: HPI Practitioner
resource.description: The practitioner exposed by the HPI. This is the person who delivers care - regardless of qualification.

resource.name: HPI Practitioner role
resource.description: The practitioner role exposed by the HPI. Used to connect Practitioners with Organizations and Locations, indicating the role they have. A single Practitioner can have roles with multple organizations.

resource.name: Additional_authorization
resource.description: Additional authorizations that a practitioner is authorized to perform

resource.name: AliasType
resource.description: Indicates the type of alias name. VS Binding is done by the profile.

resource.name: Condition_on_practice
resource.description: A full description of the conditions the health practitioner is subject to in relation to their scope of practice.

resource.name: Death_date
resource.description: The date the person died.

resource.name: Location_established
resource.description: The period over which the location is open

resource.name: Organization_period
resource.description: The period over which the Organization is active

resource.name: PractitionerRole_creator
resource.description: The organisation and person that created this role

resource.name: PractitionerRole_status
resource.description: The status of the role - active,ended

resource.name: Registration_initial_date
resource.description: The date the practitioner first became registered with the Responsible Authority or professional body

resource.name: Registration_status
resource.description: An indicator of the practicing status of the practitioner as supplied by their Responsible Authority or professional body.

resource.name: Scope_of_practice
resource.description: The type or range of health services a practitioner is authorized to perform, as determined by the Responsible Authority or professional body.

resource.name: HPI Additional Authorisation
resource.description: A coded type for additional authorisations

resource.name: Location aliases
resource.description: The set of alias types that apply to Locations

resource.name: Type of location
resource.description: Services delivered at the location

resource.name: Organization aliases
resource.description: The set of alias types that apply to Organizations

resource.name: PractitionerRoleCodes
resource.description: Coded roles that cam be in a PractitionerRole

resource.name: PractitonerRole status reason
resource.description: The reason for the current status of PractitionerRole

resource.name: Registration Authority
resource.description: The coded form of the qualification - eg medical or Nursing council identifier

resource.name: HPI Registration Status
resource.description: The code list represents the current practicing status of the Provider Person as per their registration with an RA or a health worker source.

resource.name: Scope of practice
resource.description: A coded type for professional scope of practice.

resource.name: HPI Additional Authorisation
resource.description: Additional authorisations that a practitioner is authorised to practice or prescribe.

resource.name: Type of Alias
resource.description: Used in Organization and Location to indicate what is the type of Alias

resource.name: Type of Location
resource.description: Services delivered at the location

resource.name: PractitionerRoleCodes
resource.description: Coded roles that cam be in a PractitionerRole

resource.name: PractitonerRole status reason
resource.description: The reason for the current status of PractitionerRole

resource.name: Registration Authority
resource.description: The coded form of the qualification - eg medical or Nursing council identifier

resource.name: HPI Registration Status
resource.description: The code list represents the current practicing status of the Provider Person as per their registration with an RA or a health worker source.

resource.name: Scope of practice
resource.description: A classification of the type or range of health services that a practitioner is authorised to provide, as determined by the Responsible Authority or other statutory authority (e.g. PHARMAC), that is, what the practitioner can or cannot do. It includes Scope of Practice as defined by the Health Practitioners Competence Assurance Act 2003, any special authorisations granted, and any conditions or limitations imposed by the Responsible Authority.

resource.name: CapabilityStatement
resource.description: Represents API exposed by HPI

resource.name: HpiEndpointLM
resource.description: The enpoint resource used by the HPI

resource.name: HpiLocationLM
resource.description: The Location resource used by the HPI service

resource.name: HpiOrganizationLM
resource.description: The Organization resource used by the HPI application.

resource.name: HpiPractitionerLM
resource.description:
The Practitioner exposed by the HPI

Use cases:

* What is a person's CPN when I know the persons registration number i.e. Get using registration number
* What is a person's CPN when the person doesn’t have a registration i.e. search by name, gender
* What is a person's CPN when I don’t know the person’s registration number or CPN i.e. search by name, gender scope of practice
* What are a practitioner’s details (eg practicing certificate dates) when I have a CPN. ie. Get using CPN

resource.name: HpiPractitionerRoleLM
resource.description: HpiPractitionerRole
